subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chase Utley hit his major league-leading 20th home run and Pat Burrell had a tie-breaking, two-run double Sunday as the host Philadelphia Phillies rallied to beat the Florida Marlins, 7-5.
snippet: Chase Utley hit his major league-leading 20th home run and Pat Burrell had a tie-breaking, two-run double Sunday as the host Philadelphia Phillies rallied to beat the Florida Marlins, 7-5.
